channel.title: Posts on K S Madhavan & Associates
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on K S Madhavan & Associates

item.title: Antonio Vivaldi
item.description: On Coding Claude Debussy: “Works of art make rules; rules do not make works of art.” Leonard Bernstein: “To achieve great things, two things are needed; a plan, and not quite enough time.
